Who We Are

Looking to reenvision your home? Whether you’ve spent years in the same home and have decided it’s time for an update or you just moved in and are ready to get to work, we’ve got you covered.

For the last 16 years. Carrillo Home Improvement have been committed to our customers. We have been servicing the Dover, New Jersey area, including Bergen County, Morris County, Essex County, and Passaic County. Now we’re looking to help put you one step closer to your dream home!
